base.$description: Deep charcoal - primary app background, dark mode base. Warm, almost-black tone for emotional containment.

surface.$description: Midnight slate - elevated surfaces, secondary background. Cool blue-grey for cards and containers.

card.$description: Bento card surface - warm charcoal for problem cards. Must maintain 4.5:1 contrast with text.

elevated.$description: Elevated surface for modals, dialogs, hover states. Lighter than card for hierarchy.

coral.$description: Bright coral - warmth, friendliness, emotional highlights. Primary accent for problem cards.

sky.$description: Sky blue - primary CTAs, conversational bubbles, Unmess Me button. Passes WCAG AA on dark.

mint.$description: Mint/teal - positive, calming, supportive actions. Success states and progress indicators.

lilac.$description: Lilac/soft purple - reflective, introspective elements. Used for thoughtful moments.

citrus.$description: Citrus yellow - small highlights, energy bursts. Use sparingly for emphasis.

primary.$description: Primary text on dark backgrounds. Pure white for maximum readability.

secondary.$description: Secondary text, metadata, timestamps. Softer contrast for hierarchy.

disabled.$description: Disabled text and inactive states. Still legible but visually muted.

on-accent.$description: Text on accent color backgrounds (coral, sky, mint, etc). Ensures WCAG AA contrast.

default.$description: Default border color for cards, inputs, dividers. Subtle separation on dark backgrounds.

focus.$description: Focus indicator border (sky blue). Must meet 3:1 contrast vs adjacent colors for accessibility.

indigo-subtle.$description: Soft indigo tint gradient for background ambiance. 5-10% opacity, used sparingly.
